overview: Gisele Everett joined Citi in April 1998 as part of Citi Venture Capital International (“CVCI”), one of Citi’s private equity investment arms. In April 2007, she joined Citi Alternative Investments’ (“CAI”) newly created standalone investment unit Sustainable Development Investments (“SDI”). Gisele is currently a board member of HydroPoint Data Systems, Inc., Poseidon Water, LLC, EnerTech Environmental, Inc, SolarReserve, Inc., MBA Polymers, Inc., and GreatPoint Energy, Inc. While at CVCI, Gisele completed private equity investments and divestitures in the packaging, media, technology, distribution, business services, and utilities sectors.
